name: Typewriter Key Necklace - Arch Shaped Royal Keys
Heirloom Photo Locket Kit
description:
These awesome new kits make two photo locket necklaces - this is a complete kit! It has everything you need to make two beautiful lockets. You will receive:

2 round antiqued brass lockets
2 antiqued brass chains
2 epoxy cabochons
1 set of instructions with pictures
and it all comes in one decorative, reusable tin

These kits are super easy, tons of fun, and you can make something totally awesome in no time at all! 

Shipping on this item is free to all US addresses.

name: Oakland Map Locket - Brushed Matte Silver
description:
Wear your hometown pride! These lockets are made in the Bay Area with silver plated brass components - the lockets themselves measure 20mm (about the size of a nickel), and come attached to a pretty 18" tiny beaded silver plated chain.

Want a longer chain? Just leave a message in the 'notes to seller' section of the PayPal checkout and we'll make it any length up to 24".

name: Letterpress Necklaces
description:
An impossibly pretty necklace, from an unlikely source. Vintage letterpress strikes are wrapped with a bit of sterling silver and suspended from an 18" antiqued sterling silver chain. Ethereal and light, simply beautiful.

These also make really sweet bridesmaids gifts - please use the contact form on the right to inquire, or give us a call at 415 710 4726. Thanks!

name: Vintage Map Lockets - Oxidized Silver - Petit
description:
Our newest best seller! A thoughtful tribute to sentimental locations, these lockets are handmade of oxidized silver plated brass and vintage maps from all over the world. Each pendant, which measures 3/4" in diameter, comes attached to a matching 18" chain.

You choose the location! We can make lockets with virtually any location in the world -  please include a note during the checkout process and we'll create a custom locket for you! We use atlases and maps from the mid - 20th century to create these one of a kind pieces. Please allow 7 business days for delivery.


Questions? Don't hesitate to drop us an email at theweekendstore at gmail dot com and we can discuss!

name: State Charm Necklace, 14K GF
description:
This state necklace features an antiqued silver charm in the shape of your favorite state! So dainty, so cute - perfect gift for graduates, travelers, or homesick friends.

The state's name is stamped on the tiny charm in the shape of the state, and hangs from your choice of a delicate 20" 14K GF chain, backed my a round brass disc. Charms measure approximately 1/4 - 1/2 inch, depending on location.

Choose your state from the dropdown menu. Enjoy!


All States Available:

Alabama, Alaska, Arizona, Arkansas, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Georgia, Hawaii, Idaho, Illinois, Indiana, Iowa, Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Mississippi, Missouri, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New Mexico, New York, North Carolina, North Dakota, Ohio, Oklahoma, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, South Carolina, South Dakota, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Vermont, Virginia, Washington, West Virginia, Wisconsin, Wyoming

name: Time Flies Rings
description:
We've taken our popular Time Flies design, and made it into a sweet little ring. Our signature vintage watchface with a bird in flight sits atop a 28mm round adjustable antique silver or antique brass ring blank (sizes 6 - 9).

You will receive one of the rings pictured - choose your selection from the drop down menu below.

Each ring comes packaged with a cute little gift box. Enjoy!

options.name: dark gray watchface - antique brass ring

name: Antiqued Silver Monogram Locket
description:
Antiqued silver personalized locket, choose your letter - made with antique silver plated brass components right here in our Bay Area design studio. Each necklace features a pretty 18" silver plated chain and is signed with our logo tag

Choose a letter from the dropdown menu  - your necklace will be sent to you, ready for gifting, in our signature gift box. Enjoy!

name: Time Flies Necklace - Antique Silver
description:
A new take on our original classic! We've taken a vintage watchface and secured it to a beautifully intricate antiqued silver setting. Super pretty, super cool.

Each watchface is unique - you may not receive the one pictured, but rest assured, the one you receive will be just as gorgeous!

Available with an 18" or 24" chain.

name: Globe Cufflinks
description: The perfect gift for the world traveler. These antiqued brass cufflinks feature hemispheres of the globe, each measuring about the size of a nickel.

name: NYC Transit Token Cufflinks
description: These tokens are no longer in use, replaced by plastic Metro Cards. Token cufflinks are a fantastic piece of nostalgia to wear.

name: Vintage Map Necklace
description:
Map necklaces are a sweet and thoughtful gift to give - you can create a lasting memento of your mom's hometown, your best friend's favorite vacation destination, the city where you first met your love, the country where your sister spent her senior year abroad - any place that holds significance for the receiver.

Our vintage map necklaces are about the size of a nickel, with our signature matte antique silver finish. Each pendant comes with a very pretty 18" antiqued silver chain. We use original images from 
maps dating back to the 30s, like the Paris necklace pictured.

Don't see the location you want? We are happy to create a custom necklace for you - simply choose the Custom option in the dropdown menu, then indicate the city, state, province, country or continent in the 'notes to seller' section of the checkout process. We will create and send your necklace off in 7 business days!

name: Antique Brass Envelope Locket
description:
This diminuitive little locket (less than 3/4" wide by less than 1/2" high) is just darling. It has a beautiful wave pattern etched on the from and back, and opens like a real envelope, to reveal an inner compartment, perfect for adding a little love note. 

Available with a matching 18" chain.

name: Square Vintage Map Cufflinks - Antique Brass
description:
Now you can wear your heart on your sleeve! Pick any location in the world that you love, and we'll make a pair of custom cufflinks for you! Be specific - we specialize in really small, hard to find places - Yelm Washington, Villa Santa Maria Italy - you name it, we've done it! The only thing we can't do are streets/intersections.

Available in antique brass. Please indicate your choice of location(s) in the comments section of the checkout process.

These cufflinks also make fantastic groomsmen's gifts - send us an email at theweekendstore at gmail dot com or call 415 710 4726 and we can discuss. Thanks! We look forward to creating a special piece for you soon.

name: Vintage Typewriter Key Necklaces
description:
These necklaces feature an authentic, vintage typewriter letter key from a Smith Corona, Royal or Underwood typewriter manufactured in the first half of the 20th Century. We never use reproductions - since the keys are over 50 years old, they often show a bit of wear. Around here, we call that character!

Each pendant comes on an 18" gunmetal chain, finished with a sturdy, easy to use lobster clasp and our signature logo tag. We'll send along our super cute gift box as well.

name: Time Flies Lockets
description:
We've taken our popular Time Flies design, and made it into a sweet little lockets. Our signature vintage watchface with a bird in flight sits atop a 32mm round, antique brass lockets, and comes attached to a 24" chain.

The watch faces we use are all unique, and the selection is ever changing - we use white/ivory/gray colored faces on the lockets, and although you will most likely not get the locket that's pictured, we guarantee you will get one that you will totally love!

Each necklace comes with our signature logo tag and a cute little gift box. Enjoy!

name: Monogram Cufflinks - Antiqued Brass
description:
Custom initial cufflinks, made to order, featuring gorgeous antiqued brass letters set in antiqued brass. The brass letter discs measure 14mm in diameter.

When checking out in PayPal, leave us a message with your letter choices in the 'message to seller' box - your cufflinks will be sent to you, ready for gifting, in our signature gift box. Enjoy!

name: Schwinn Bicycle Advertisement Necklace
description:
I love our new charm necklace, featuring a colorful, fun vintage Schwinn bicycle advertisement . The picture dome is mounted in our signature matte antique silver pendant setting, and measures 20mm in diameter, about the size of a nickel.

The bicycle charm hangs from a simple silver plated chain that closes with a lobster clasp. The necklace is 18 inches and includes an extender chain to make it adjustable to 19 inches.

 A great gift for the cycling enthusiast in your life!

name: Typewriter Key Ring - Handmade Pewter Setting
description:
Set in our hand cast pewter settings, these typewriter rings are pretty cool! Adjustable from size 6 - 9.

Made to order! Choose a letter from the dropdown menu, and we'll make a beautiful ring for you.

name: Monogram Cufflinks - Antiqued Pewter
description:
Custom initial cufflinks, made to order, featuring gorgeous antiqued silver letters set in antiqued pewter settings, made in our San Francisco Bay Area studio. The letter discs measure 14mm in diameter.

Choose any two letters (leave a message in the 'notes to seller' section of the PayPal checkout) - your cufflinks will be sent to you, ready for gifting, in our signature gift box. Enjoy!

name: Monogram Locket - Antiqued Brass
description:
Letter J locket necklace, or choose any letter - made with antiqued brass components right here in our Bay Area design studio. Each necklace features a pretty bar chain, 16" with a 1" extender.

Choose a letter from the dropdown menu - your necklace will be sent to you, ready for gifting, in our signature gift box. Enjoy!

name: Vintage Map Locket - Antique Brass - Petit
description:
Our newest best seller! A thoughtful remembrance of the place where you grew up, where you met your true love, a favorite vacation destination - these delicate necklaces are handmade of oxidized brass and vintage maps from all over the world. Each locket, which measures just under 3/4" in diameter, comes attached to a matching 18" chain.

You choose the location! We can make lockets with virtually any location in the world -  please include a note during the checkout process and we'll create a custom locket for you! Please allow 7 business days for delivery.

Questions? Don't hesitate to drop us an email at theweekendstore at gmail dot com and we can discuss!

name: Coronet Typewriter Key Necklace
description:
A beautiful vintage typewriter key, culled from mid-20th century Smith Corona, Royal or Underwood typewriters, is set in our exclusive Coronet pendant setting. We had this pewter pendant made especially for us, and we love it!  Each Coronet pendant comes with an 18" chain, and our signature gift box.

All of the typewriter keys we use in our pieces are authentic, repurposed keys, all over 60 years old. As a result, the keys show a bit of wear, and often have imperfections on the rims or faces. I think this is what adds to their character and beauty. The Japanese have a practice called wabi sabi, which, in its simplest form, means beauty that is "imperfect, impermanent, and incomplete". In one sense wabi sabi is a school of thought whereby the student of wabi sabi learns to find the most simple objects interesting, fascinating and beautiful. Fading autumn leaves would be an example. Wabi sabi can change our perception of the world to the extent that a chip or crack in a vase makes it more interesting and gives the object greater meditative value. Similarly materials that age such as bare wood, paper and fabric become more interesting as they exhibit changes that can be observed over time. (Wikipedia)

The Weekend Store celebrates the art of wabi sabi in our jewelry. Each imperfection represents a stroke of the key that may have been used to write love letters, that first great novel, or poetry to a distant friend. Your Coronet necklace will be a combination of modern functionality with the charm of the past, each one of a kind, with its own story to tell. Just like you.

name: Vintage Map Drawer Pulls
description:
Our newest product! I designed these pewter drawer pulls, and had them antiqued to a pretty dark silver finish. Inside are original clippings from mid Century Collier's atlases - no copies! I love Colliers because the colors are so beautiful (turquoise, orange and ivory).

Each drawer pull comes with two screws (so you can use it as a drawer pull or a cabinet knob), and comes packaged in black box, ready for gifting. 

Please email theweekendstore at gmail dot com to inquire about custom locations.

name: Custom Vintage Typewriter Key Cufflinks
description:
Bored with the commercially available cufflink settings available, we decided to make our own! Solid pewter cast cufflinks, in a clean, modern design, are the perfect setting for vintage typewriter keys. Antiqued to a warm antique silver finish.

Made to order! Please indicate your choice of letters in the 'notes to seller' section of the checkout process.

name: Vintage Typewriter Key Bracelet
description:
Authentic vintage typewriter keys, culled from mid-20th century Smith Corona, Royal or Underwood typewriters, are connected with our pretty lace edge settings to spell out the 7 letter word or saying of your choice. Each custom made bracelets comes packaged with  our signature gift box.

All of the typewriter keys we use in our pieces are authentic, repurposed keys, all over 60 years old. As a result, the keys show a bit of wear, and often have imperfections on the rims or faces. I think this is what adds to their character and beauty. The Japanese have a practice called wabi sabi, which, in its simplest form, means beauty that is "imperfect, impermanent, and incomplete". In one sense wabi sabi is a school of thought whereby the student of wabi sabi learns to find the most simple objects interesting, fascinating and beautiful. Fading autumn leaves would be an example. Wabi sabi can change our perception of the world to the extent that a chip or crack in a vase makes it more interesting and gives the object greater meditative value. Similarly materials that age such as bare wood, paper and fabric become more interesting as they exhibit changes that can be observed over time. (Wikipedia)

The Weekend Store celebrates the art of wabi sabi in our jewelry. Each imperfection represents a stroke of the key that may have been used to write love letters, that first great novel, or poetry to a distant friend. Your bracelet will be a combination of modern functionality with the charm of the past, each one of a kind, with its own story to tell. Just like you.

Each bracelet measures 7 1/2", with a 2" extender chain for a perfect fit. Please contact us if you have different size requirements.

name: Vintage Typewriter Key Locket - Petit Silver
description:
As featured in the December 2011 issue of Chatelaine magazine - a Weekend Store exclusive! We've soldered the perfect bezel cup to petite (21mm) round antique silver lockets, and attached them to 18" silver plated chains.

These necklaces make lovely bridesmaids gifts - please use the contact form on the right to inquire. Thanks!

name: Decanter Label Typewriter Key Necklace
description:
Based on a favorite necklace from designer Adjowah Brodie's own personal collection, these decanter label necklaces are a Weekend Store exclusdive! A beautiful vintage typewriter key, culled from mid-20th century Smith Corona, Royal or Underwood typewriters, rests atop the antiqued pewter decanter label replica.  Each decanter label necklace measures 18" in total length, and comes with our signature gift box. (please drop us a note if you'd like a longer chain)

All of the typewriter keys we use in our pieces are authentic, repurposed keys, all over 60 years old. As a result, the keys show a bit of wear, and often have imperfections on the rims or faces. I think this is what adds to their character and beauty. The Japanese have a practice called wabi sabi, which, in its simplest form, means beauty that is "imperfect, impermanent, and incomplete". In one sense wabi sabi is a school of thought whereby the student of wabi sabi learns to find the most simple objects interesting, fascinating and beautiful. Fading autumn leaves would be an example. Wabi sabi can change our perception of the world to the extent that a chip or crack in a vase makes it more interesting and gives the object greater meditative value. Similarly materials that age such as bare wood, paper and fabric become more interesting as they exhibit changes that can be observed over time. (Wikipedia)

The Weekend Store celebrates the art of wabi sabi in our jewelry. Each imperfection represents a stroke of the key that may have been used to write love letters, that first great novel, or poetry to a distant friend. Your decanter label necklace will be a combination of modern functionality with the charm of the past, each one of a kind, with its own story to tell. Just like you.

name: Schwinn Bicycle Advertisement Cufflinks
description:
I love our new oval cufflinks, featuring a colorful, fun vintage Schwinn bicycle advertisement . The picture dome is mounted in our signature antique brass oval cufflink settings, and measures 13 x18mm in diameter, about the size of a jellybean.

 A great gift for the cycling enthusiast in your life!

name: Schwinn Bicycle Advertisement Tieclip
description:
I love our new tie clip, featuring a colorful, fun vintage Schwinn bicycle advertisement . The picture dome is mounted in our signature matte antique silver tie clip setting.

 A great gift for the cycling enthusiast in your life!

name: Schwinn Bicycle Advertisement Ring
description:
I love our new ring, featuring a colorful, fun vintage Schwinn bicycle advertisement . The picture dome is mounted in our signature matte antique silver adjustable ring setting, and measures 15mm in diameter, about the size of a dime. The rings are adjustable from about a size 6 to a size 9.

 A great gift for the cycling enthusiast in your life!

name: Vintage Typewriter Key Function/Punctuation Necklaces
description:
Perfect for the grammar geek in your life! These perfect little keys from Royal typewriters are set in antique silver settings, and suspended from 18" gunmetal chains.

Please click the arrows to see more pictures, and chose the key you'd like from the dropdown menu.

name: Time Flies Necklace - Antique Brass
description:
A new take on our original classic! We've taken a vintage watchface and secured it to a beautifully intricate brass setting. Super pretty, super cool.

Each watchface is unique - you will not receive the one pictured, but rest assured, the one you receive will be just as gorgeous!

Available with an 18" or 24" chain.

name: Sweetheart Locket
description:
A pretty little 18 x 25mm oval antique silver locket on a total sweetheart of a chain - a darling gift for yourself, or someone else you love.

Chain measures 18", and is finished with a secure, easy to use lobster clasp and our signature logo tag. The necklace is shipped along with our super cute gift box.
